original_text: While Peter was still saying these things, the Holy Spirit fell on all who heard the word.
korean_text: 베드로가 이 말을 할 때에 성령이 말씀 듣는 모든 사람에게 내려오시니

sentences.original_text: While Peter was still saying these things,
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 아직 이 말을 하는 동안,

sentences.original_text: on all who heard the word.
